item.title: Bulletin updated at 16:30 HKT 08/Jul/2019
item.author: Hong Kong Observatory
item.description:
General Situation:
A southwesterly airstream will bring hot weather to the coast of Guangdong tomorrow. There will also be a few showers over the region. Under the influence of a trough of low pressure, showers will increase and there will be squally thunderstorms over the coastal areas in the following couple of days. The anticyclone aloft is expected to strengthen towards the weekend. The weather will improve over southeastern China.
